# _(Q1)_ Creatinine Levels and Survivorship Status

```{r mri-data}

# Load data
mri <-
  read.table("data/mri.txt", header = TRUE) %>%
  dplyr::as_tibble() %>%
  dplyr::select(.data$crt, .data$obstime) %>%
  dplyr::transmute(
    `Survived >5 years` = dplyr::if_else(.data$obstime >= 5 * 365, 1L, 0L),
    `High CRT` = dplyr::if_else(.data$crt > 1.2, 1L, 0L)
  )

```
